GSD.description:
acct: fix potential integer overflow in encode_comp_t()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit e93f995a591c352d35d89c518c54f790e1537754. For more details please see the references link.
